roleset.name: excite
roleset.note: THRILL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'thrill' based on sentences in wsj, adjectival 'thrilling' based on BOLT-1; adjectival 'thrilled' based on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from thrill.01-v)
THRILL-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on thrill-v.01 and .02. Corresponds to Vncls amuse-31.1. (from thrill.01-n)
THRILLING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from thrilling.01-j)
THRILLED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from thrilled.01-j)

example.name: passive
example.text: But Pemex managers are [the ones]-1 most thrilled [*]-1 by the contract.

example.name: active
example.text: That doesn't thrill Procter& Gamble Co., maker of Cascade dishwasher detergent.
example.arg: Procter& Gamble Co., maker of Cascade dishwasher detergent

example.name: adjectival rel: thrilling
example.text: Granted , what Obama is up to these days is pretty thrilling .
example.arg: what Obama is up to these days

example.name: adjectival rel: thrilled
example.text: I tossed this idea out right here on the Forum several months ago -- it 's such an obvious part of a solution , and I am thrilled a few others have come up with the same thought .
example.arg: a few others have come up with the same thought

example.name: just arg0
example.text: We 're asking the court for a number of things he can grant in addition to the thrill of victory

example.name: both args
example.text: ... his desire for domination, his thrill at control, his pride in being a craftsman of death ...

example.name: just arg0
example.text: In the fall of 1923, they devised a plan for the perfect murder, to be committed for the sake of its thrill.

roleset.name: prepositional usage
roleset.note: THRILL-V NOTES: Member of VNcls marvel-31.3-1 (from thrill.02-v)

example.name: prepositional
example.text: John thrills at the sound of Mary's snoring.
example.arg: at the sound of Mary's snoring

example.name: usage that supports membership in 31.3-9
example.text: Fawkes thrilled happily at them but did not move seeming to sense that this was not a time for his affections.
